00023 void calcHamiltonian(const Interaction *Int,
00024                      const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00025                      double* h)
00026 {
00027   double v[Int->n];
00028   double t, tcm = 0.0;
00029 
00030   calcT(Q, X, &t); 
00031   if (Int->cm) 
00032     calcTCM(Q, X, &tcm);
00033   calcPotential(Int, Q, X, v);
00034 
00035   *h = t - tcm + v[0];
00036 }

00039 void calcHamiltonianod(const Interaction *Int,
00040                        const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00041                        const SlaterDetAux* X,
00042                        complex double* h)
00043 {
00044   complex double v[Int->n];
00045   complex double t, tcm = 0.0;
00046 
00047   calcTod(Q, Qp, X, &t);
00048   if (Int->cm)
00049     calcTCMod(Q, Qp, X, &tcm);
00050   calcPotentialod(Int, Q, Qp, X, v);
00051   
00052   *h = t - tcm + v[0];
00053 }

00056 // Tcm ?
00057 void calcHamiltonianHF(const Interaction* Int,
00058                        const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00059                        void* mes)
00060 {
00061   int A=Q->A;
00062   complex double t[A*A];
00063   complex double tcm[A*A];
00064   complex double v[A*A];
00065 
00066   calcTHF(Q, X, t);
00067   if (Int->cm)
00068     calcTCMHF(Q, X, tcm);
00069   calcPotentialHF(Int, Q, X, v);
00070 
00071   complex double *h = mes;
00072   int k,m;
00073 
00074   for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00075     for (k=0; k<A; k++) {
00076       h[k+m*A] = t[k+m*A] + v[k+m*A];
00077       if (Int->cm)
00078         h[k+m*A] -= tcm[k+m*A];
00079     }
00080 }
